plot: After having booked their honeymoon, the love between salsa dancer Ron and hairdresser Biggi is put on a hard test.
title: Salsa Biggicita
plot_es: After having booked their honeymoon, the love between salsa dancer Ron and hairdresser Biggi is put on a hard test.
plot_en: After having booked their honeymoon, the love between salsa dancer Ron and hairdresser Biggi is put on a hard test.
